mapper.insert: insert into dealer (id, name, price_rate, remark, create_time, create_user, last_update_time, last_update_user) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update dealer set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price_rate = #{priceRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, price_rate, remark, create_time, create_user, last_update_time, last_update_user from dealer where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, name, price_rate, remark, create_time, create_user, last_update_time, last_update_user from dealer
